Plot Summary:

Simon, who was driving and alcohol, fate seriously injured. He will lose everything. His family life. His job as a cop. Six years later, divorced his wife Alice, Simon became a money belt and struggles to keep his role as father to his son Theo, who is now 9 years old. Franck, always a cop, remote stand on it. During a bullfight, the little Theo will be in spite of him witnessing a mafia settlement account. Very soon it will be threatened. Simon will do anything to protect her son and find his pursuers.
